main_definition: Months refer to the divisions of a year, typically consisting of around 30 or 31 days, used for measuring time.

meanings_and_examples.example: I have been living in this city for six months.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Plurality of months within a year
meanings_and_examples.example: There are twelve months in a year, starting from January to December.
February is the second month of the year.
